thread.title: Lincoln FA Cup hero Alan Power reveals he was pals with UFC star Conor McGregor.. and used to play football with him

author: jhutchinson
title: Lincoln FA Cup hero Alan Power reveals he was pals with UFC star Conor McGregor.. and used to play football with him
text:
EFL 'We used to knock about back home' Lincoln FA Cup hero Alan Power reveals he was pals with UFC star Conor McGregor.. and used to play football with him 
The central midfielder, who netted in the previous round's victory against Ipswich, is a dead ringer for The Notorious by JOHN HUTCHINSON
